description: Chronological or sequential stages rendered as a timeline. Each node shows a label, description, and optional counterfactual. Good for evolution tracking, path dependencies, and any data with inherent temporal ordering.
instantiation_hints: 1. Set orientation to 'vertical' for detailed timelines or 'horizontal' for compact overview. 2. Set label_field to the field containing the node label. 3. Set chain_field to the array of sequential steps. 4. Add counterfactual_field if each node has a 'what if this didn't happen' analysis. 5. Add badge_field for status indicators on nodes.
